title: HELP! My in-game client will not load/connect to the internet.

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having a hard time staying connected specifically to our servers.  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this towards a resolution.  In addition, if you have any apps running like play.tv I recommend removing them as they've been known to cause issues during champ select.  Let me know if you have any questions.

Hi,

I'm still struggling over here and I am also in contact with riot support. Tried playing again today and the same problem arose. However, about 10 minutes into the game I was able to join and PLAY in the game. This is confusing because if it was a connection issue surely it would consistent throughout the whole period of the game?

This happens to me whenever the champions in game suddenly disappears all of a sudden and I have to reconnect and it won't let me reconnect and relates to the internet issue, this has happened to me ever since the update to the latest patch.
